channel.title: Delta need help!

item.title: Delta need help!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10006 && specialAmount > 9){ AttackingOn2.specGFX(293); specialAmount -= 10; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(812); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; }

Try that ;p

item.title: Delta need help!
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

ok so i wanted to add spec to staff of light i got spec bar and stuf and i added the to client.java

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 10006 && specialAmount > 99){ AttackingOn2.specGFX(293); specialAmount -= 100; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(812); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; }but the spec doesnt work? wats wrong with this?
